query:
SELECT 
  COUNT(*) as total_reviews,
  SUM(CASE WHEN hasReply = false OR hasReply IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as pending_reviews,
  SUM(CASE WHEN hasReply = true THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as responded_reviews
FROM guestReviews;

  SUM(CASE WHEN hasReply = false OR hasReply IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as pending_reviews,
  SUM(CASE WHEN hasReply = true THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as responded_reviews
